description: John Smith is a professional chef with over 10 years of experience in the culinary industry. He is passionate about creating new and innovative recipes that not only taste delicious but are also visually appealing. John has worked in various restaurants and has gained a reputation for his expertise in Italian cuisine.

recipes.cookingMethod: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.2. In a separate pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. 3. Add onion and garlic and cook until onion is translucent. 4. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 5. Add canned tomatoes, tomato paste, and beef broth. 6. Reduce heat and let simmer for 20-30 minutes. 7. Season with salt and pepper to taste. 8. Serve spaghetti topped with the sauce and grated parmesan cheese.
